Extracts a business’s slug from it’s full BRP url

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: a string to be used in text-based searches

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Geographic latitude in decimal degrees. When paired with lng, it forms geographic coordinates to center your search around.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Geographic longitude in decimal degrees. When paired with lat, it forms geographic coordinates to center your search around.

parameters.name: postcode
parameters.description: In most cases, a 5-digit United States ZIP code, used to filter your search results to the center of this area.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius of the search, measured in miles, to search around your geographic coordinates is used with either lat/lng or postcode. It defaults to 25 miles. It will clamp the range to be between 5 and 250 miles.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for the request. The default page is 1.

get.description:
Returns a paginated list of businesses based on keywords and/or location. The API returns up
to 30 businesses per request. Results are sorted by relevance or distance depending on
submitted parameters.

get.description: Returns a business’s details

parameters.name: slug-or-id-dot-format
parameters.description: The slug OR the id of a business, followed by a period and the format (JSON,JSONP,XML)

reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
reviews.comments: I just recently brought my brand new car in to get fixed and they did such an awesome job! They were so nice and friendly and made my car look as good as new! They went above and beyond and I thank you all for working so well on my car!!!

reviews.title: A five star shop all the way around
reviews.comments: This shop deserves a five star rating. From the time you step through the front door until you pick up your car when it's done, and see the quality of the work they've done. the Best !!

reviews.title: Not done right the first time.
reviews.comments:
Went to pick the car up, quickly noticed the wiring dangling under the car, which they fixed.
Now I just found the CD changer in the back seat as well as the cover. Mounting screws are nowhere to be found.  Called them at their tech claimed that they never removed the CD changer.  Don't have time to keep bringing the car back for low quality work.  I'll do it myself, and find a different body shop for next time.

reviews.title: Quality Service
reviews.comments: Forced to get a quote from ARA by other insurance company but decided to go with them due to professionalism and location. Grabbed a new windshield from the shop next door and also got my rental from Enterprise located in the same complex. Very easy to work with. Would highly recommend to others.
David said it took 1 week longer than promised because they were waiting for parts to arrive. He had a good experience.

Pamela said the business is super flexible. She was supposed to bring her vehicle in on a Tuesday, but there was a three hour ferry line so the business switched her appointment to Wedensday. They even  contacted the rental place about the change.

Rod said this business was on a list from Encompass Insurance and he got estimates from 3 or 4 other places, but this business was the lowest. Their location was also very convenient to his workplace.
Jim said he was out of town while his vehicle was being repaired and it was not necessary to keep him informed.
Marsha said they did a pretty good job.
Anna stated that the repairs took three extra days because the business was waiting for parts to be delivered.

get.description: This resource will provide the most recent reviews for a business.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of reviews to return. If not specified, the default of 10 will be returned. We will never return more than 50.

parameters.name: slug-or-id
parameters.description: The slug OR the id of a business
